description: Liverpool news: Phil McNulty on if Salah makes Liverpool's greatest XI
title: Liverpool news: Phil McNulty on if Salah makes Liverpool's greatest XI
title_page: Liverpool news: Phil McNulty on if Salah makes Liverpool's greatest XI - BBC Sport
maintext:
BBC chief football writer Phil McNulty has been answering your questions.
Lee in Essex asked: Do you think any of the players currently playing in the Premier League would get into their respective club's greatest ever XI?
